Articles.Content:
After seeing a few youtube videos on the "kollaborative warfare" I thought that it looked pretty fun, and was wondering if anyone would like to do a similar event with me or others. Mods would include kerbinside and BW armory, obviously, but other mods (and rules) are up for discussion. I will also be posting this on reddit.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-22T14:53:40Z" title="07/22/2015 02:53  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 22, 2015</time> by gigaboom2**

Commenting here as well: While I've had a blast battling BD AI's, I'd love to do some actual battle. I watched a bunch of the Kollaberative Warfare vids today at work, and it looks super fun. Let's do it.
I would love to participate! Gimme the contacts and stuff, and I'll comply.
So, like... do we hyperedit stuff to places and blow it up, or is it going to be like StarCraft or C&C?

You will drive each vehicle to the opponent's base, so no hyperedit. You can watch a few videos to see how it will work. (Although we may change the rules a bit)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PL7TVzn8CoIqkRv5irA37ONb2i_lnAqpX1" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Derpotron and Xyphos, could you make reddit accounts so we could discuss all together?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-23T21:03:09Z" title="07/23/2015 09:03  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 23, 2015</time> by gigaboom2**
If anyone else wants to play, comment here or go to reddit under subreddit "KSPWarfare", my reddit username is Derpex5.
Can you make this a server on DMP?
DMP does not work with BDarmoury. The way it calculates collisions makes it so that 1/10 bullets aimed right actually hit and somtimes even missiles just phase through the target.

Unfortunately we do not allow for roleplay scenarios on the forums because it tends to get out of hand when people don't distinguish between the roleplay situations and the rest of the forums. Thread closed.
